testcase.classname: MS Teams Login Page Test Cases
testcase.name: Verify Incorrect UserName Error Message is Displayed when User Logs in with Incorrect UserName
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to MSTeams login page...................................passed When User Enter a InCorrect User Name & Click Next..........................passed Then Incorrect UserName Error Message is Displayed..........................passed

testcase.classname: MS Teams Login Page Test Cases
testcase.name: Verify InvalidUserName Error/InvalidPhoneNo Msg is Displayed when User Logs in with Invalid UserName
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to MSTeams login page...................................passed When User Enter InValid User Name & Click Next..............................passed Then Invalid UserName Error Message is Displayed............................passed When User Clears the InvalidUserName and Enters Exception UserName and Clicks on Next.passed Then InvalidPhoneNo Error Message is Displayed..............................passed

testcase.classname: MS Teams Login Page Test Cases
testcase.name: Verify Incorrect Password Error Message is Displayed when User Logs in with Valid UserName and Invalid Password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to MSTeams login page...................................passed When User Enter a Valid User Name & Click Next..............................passed And User Enter InValid Password & Click SignIn..............................passed Then Incorrect Password Error Message is Displayed..........................passed

testcase.classname: MS Teams Login Page Test Cases
testcase.name: Verify User is able to Login and Log out to MS Teams with valid UserName and Valid Password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to MSTeams login page...................................passed When User Enter a Valid User Name & Click Next..............................passed And User Enter Valid Password & Click SignIn................................passed Then AppPromotion Page is Displayed.........................................passed When On selection WebApp link on AppPromotion Page..........................passed Then Signed In Successfully.................................................passed When User SignOut from the application......................................passed Then Signed Out Successfully................................................passed
